nodes.name: calculateReward

params._tokenAddress: Address of the locked token. For ETH, it will be 0

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params._tokenAddress: Address of token intended to lend

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

calculateAuctionFee(address,uint256,uint.notice: Calculate the fee required to launch an auction in LiBA

commitFund(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Lock fund into the PoLC contract for a specific duration. The longer the duration and larger locked token value, more rewards will be earned. Once, the fund is locked, it can only be drawn when the lock expired. If the duration is set to 0, the fund will be lock-free, but there will be no reward.

drainToken(address,uint256).notice: Onwer drains one type of tokens when the contract is paused

lendCommitment(address,uint256,address,u.notice: Send a specific value to Liba for lending. Can only be called from LiBA

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayCommitment(address,uint256,address,.notice: Repay to the commitment when borrower returns money through LiBA

updateSupportedToken(address,bool).notice: Update a token in the supported list

withdrawFund(uint256).notice: Withdraw all available fund in a commitment if its lock has expired

withdrawReward(uint256).notice: Withdraw all available reward in a commitment if the lock has expired

userdoc.notice: Contract allows user to lock fund and collect reward.
